topic.title: Welcome to Gaclib!
topic.p: Gaclib is a GPU accelerated C++ User Interface library. You can find it at github. This library provide many useful features. If you don't need all features, you can just use a subset of released C++ files to reduce the size of the executable.
More and more developers are using this library to create their applications! You could check out majorav.com, which is a very impressive example. Scroll to the end to see screenshots!
